(Code, you're an idiot!  It had everything to do with me.  He made a comment 
about me and I have the right to respond, it in fact had nothing to do with 
you.  And, if you could read you would know JP did in fact NOT mode.  The 
missiles exploded BEFORE hitting IR.  And come up with something better than 
Slawdogg, it's utterly pathetic.  But then again, for someone of your 
intelligence, it's rather amazing.)
